articles.title: Florida recount underway in tight Senate, governor races
articles.description: A number of key midterm races are still undecided. That includes the Senate and governor races in Florida, where Republicans hold a narrow lead over their competitors. CBS News national correspondent Manuel Bojorquez reports.

articles.title: California firefighters battling dry conditions, relentless winds to contain deadly fires
articles.description: More than 3,000 firefighters have been waging an all-out attack on the Woolsey Fire. Their attack is coming from air and by land. "CBS Evening News" anchor Jeff Glor met with Cal Fire on the front line.

articles.title: California homes in ruins as wildfires rage on
articles.description: In southern California, hundreds of homes and businesses are gone after a wildfire burns for a fifth day. Now some residents are sorting through the rubble. CBS News correspondent Jamie Yuccas reports.

articles.title: "CBS Evening News" headlines for Monday, November 12, 2018
articles.description: Here's a look at the top stories making headlines on the "CBS Evening News" with Jeff Glor.

articles.title: Deadly California fire leaves more than 200 people unaccounted for
articles.description: Two major wildfires in California have forced thousands to evacuate. At least 31 people are dead, and more than 200 are unaccounted for. CBS News correspondent Mireya Villarreal is in northern California, covering the Camp Fire.

articles.title: Democrats call for Acting AG Matthew Whitaker to recuse himself
articles.description: As Democrats prepare to flex oversight in the House, some are calling for the new Acting Attorney General, Matthew Whitaker,  to recuse himself from the Mueller probe. The Hill reporter Julia Manchester joins CBSN with more.

articles.title: Wisconsin teens appear to do Nazi salute in viral prom picture
articles.description: A Wisconsin school district is investigating a photo showing a group of high school boys apparently making the Nazi salute. A school official denounced the image on Twitter and police said they were assisting the investigation.
